thread.section_title: Soundstore Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soundstore | www.soundstore.ie
thread.title: Elle

author: Elle
title: Elle
text: I went into the store with the intention of browsing speakers. A staff member Gary came over to help and discussed what I was looking for in a speaker set and my budget. He showed me the various brands and then took the time to play music through the different systems so I could hear the sound quality and bass. I bought a set with a little subwoofer and was delighted with my purchase. I was a happy customer as he ensured I was spending my money on something I was happy with, thanks again.
